website_summaries.verdict: Extra-spacious training backpack. Dual zippers on three main compartments for easy access.
pros: fits two large binders, gym clothes, a hoodie and has room to spare

customer_reviews.title: Good 🐅's
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my son for basketball season, I declined to purchase through the school because the price was outrageous I found this baby on Amazon and it's larger than the one the team purchased and it has more pockets and storage at an unbeatable price
customer_reviews.author: Hadassah Devine

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack with lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Great quality backpack with lots of room!! Sturdy and lots of pockets!!
customer_reviews.author: hellokittie

customer_reviews.title: perfect backpack for grandkids
customer_reviews.text: durable, check; soil-resistant, check; stylish, check; buy it again, check:)
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie Paige

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sons school year in Middle school, it is sturdy and he def puts a ton of stuff in it! Wrks great!
customer_reviews.author: A. Wills

customer_reviews.title: Durable great quality
customer_reviews.text: Its been 5 months since ordered and used 5 days out of the week. Great quality and super durable. Simple clean design. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely extra large size. If you are ...
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely extra large size. If you are looking for a large bag, this is for you. My daughter tought it was too large to use for her High School backpack.
customer_reviews.author: momofthree

customer_reviews.title: Lacks features many comparable brands within same price range provides.
customer_reviews.text: The material doesn’t appear to be as durable as ones I’ve had in the past. Lacks pockets within compartments for organization. Padding for laptop compartment is also lacking. Expected more from a Nike product.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke after 5 weeks other zipper keeps getting stuck very disappointing on a $50+ backpack
customer_reviews.author: readingjunkie1978

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for my 8th grader! Fits all the extras as well.
customer_reviews.author: NetteMac

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t receive what was pictured/advertised
customer_reviews.text: I received a Nike backpack, but it wasn’t the one advertised. Once this seller make contact with me I’ll update my rating but until then, it’s a 1.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent backpack, daughter is in 7th grade and always has a lot of books.
customer_reviews.author: Karilynn Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy backpack
customer_reviews.text: Using for school so it gets tossed around a lot. The material and thickness is good it has not ripped yet. The fit is comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As described. Well made. Nike Brasilia (Extra Large) Training Backpack...
customer_reviews.author: Queen Jules

customer_reviews.title: Gift for 17yo son
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bag. Ot keeps all of his fai
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy, cheap zipper and came without any tags on it. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: denihae

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Within a year the bag resulted into tear on shoulder strip, not sure if its covered in warranty...
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Another quality Nike product
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack I've ever bought. Lots of pockets and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bots

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: spacious and made out of strong durable material...very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: ayaana

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like this bag a lot, not as big as it says.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Voelker

customer_reviews.title: Be careful...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had 2 of these bags, the first one was a pile of junk but the 2nd one seems to be holding up better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nike Brasilia (Extra Large) Training Backpack
product_meta.description: A low-key look in classic organization, this ultra-durable training backpack from Nike has a large main compartment with pockets inside and out for organization. Padded straps help lighten your load.
feature_bullets: Dual main compartments with zip closure for spacious storage
Padded back and adjustable shoulder straps for comfortable carrying
Separate internal sleeve and pockets offer laptop and specialized storage
Side pockets for water and small-item storage
